title: Muyan-TTS: A Trainable Text-to-Speech Model Optimized for Podcast Scenarios with a $50K Budget
author: Xin Li (MYZY AI), Kaikai Jia (MYZY AI), Hao Sun (MYZY AI), Jun Dai (MYZY AI), Ziyang Jiang (MYZY AI), ..., Kearney (MYZY AI)
relevance_why: Muyan-TTS introduces novel methods for text-to-speech synthesis that could enhance speaker adaptation and audio generation, aligning with Haohe Liu's interests in audio processing and synthesis. Its focus on podcasts may inform future work in high-quality audio content generation.
background: Developing a text-to-speech system tailored for podcasting applications that provides high-quality, customizable voice synthesis from text input.
contribution: Muyan-TTS introduces an open-source text-to-speech model pre-trained on podcast data to enable zero-shot synthesis capability, achieving notable voice adaptation and speech quality.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Existing TTS models often lack transparency in training procedures and do not cater specifically to podcast scenarios, limiting adaptability and performance.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work incorporates a large language model with a VITS-based decoder to enhance robustness and synthesis quality, while also providing a comprehensive open-source training pipeline.

key_innovation: Integrates a large language model with a VITS decoder to effectively bridge text and speech modalities, enhancing flexibility for different speaker characteristics.
real_world_impact: Addresses the growing demand for high-quality, interactive voice synthesis in applications like podcasts, potentially revolutionizing the accessibility of TTS technology for content creators.
limitations: The model's performance can be compromised by its dependencies on specific input formats and may struggle with multilingual capabilities.

new_terms.VITS: **Variational Inference Text-to-Speech** - a generative model for text-to-speech synthesis that reduces hallucinations and enhances phonetic modeling.
new_terms.zero-shot TTS: **Zero-shot text-to-speech** - refers to the ability of a TTS system to generate speech for unseen text without requiring specific training on that text content.

open_sourcing: Code and models are available at https://github.com/MYZY-AI/Muyan-TTS
